Sentencas: The Impulse Excitation Technique (IET) was used to determine the elastic modulus and specific damping of different Ni/NiO-YSZ composites suitable for use in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Mechanical properties of NiO/Ni-YSZ composites depending on temperature, porosity and redox cycling

Sentencas: The porosity of the as-sintered samples varied from 9 to 38% and that of the reduced ones from 31 to 52%.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of NiO/Ni-YSZ composites depending on temperature, porosity and redox cycling

Sentencas: For all samples a linear relation between Young's modulus and porosity was found.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of NiO/Ni-YSZ composites depending on temperature, porosity and redox cycling

Sentencas: The temperature dependency of the mechanical properties of both as-sintered and reduced composites was investigated by IET up to 1200 degrees C.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of NiO/Ni-YSZ composites depending on temperature, porosity and redox cycling

Sentencas: In the as-sintered state, first an increase and peak of stiffness coinciding with the Neel temperature, 250 degrees C, of NiO was observed.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of NiO/Ni-YSZ composites depending on temperature, porosity and redox cycling

Sentencas: Above this temperature, a linear decrease occurred.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of NiO/Ni-YSZ composites depending on temperature, porosity and redox cycling

Sentencas: Specific damping showed a peak at 170-180 degrees C and increased above ca.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of NiO/Ni-YSZ composites depending on temperature, porosity and redox cycling
Mechanical properties of NiO/Ni-YSZ composites depending on temperature, porosity and redox cycling

Sentencas: In the reduced state the elastic modulus decreased linearly with temperature; specific damping increased above ca.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of NiO/Ni-YSZ composites depending on temperature, porosity and redox cycling

Sentencas: 600 degrees C and was found to be very dependent on microstructure.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of NiO/Ni-YSZ composites depending on temperature, porosity and redox cycling

Sentencas: Damage caused by redox cycling degraded the elastic properties of the composites.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of NiO/Ni-YSZ composites depending on temperature, porosity and redox cycling

Sentencas: Degradation started linearly from 0.5 to 0.6% redox strain leading to macroscopic sample failures at about 2.5% dL/L-o. A simple continuum elastic damage model was fitted to the degradation data.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of NiO/Ni-YSZ composites depending on temperature, porosity and redox cycling
